purpose: Meta-agent that creates, manages, coordinates, and documents all other agents in the system
capabilities: Create new agents (analyze requirements, write system prompts, generate configs)
Manage existing agents (list, update, deactivate, delete)
Coordinate agent workflows (smart routing, parallel execution)
Test agent quality (run test prompts, verify output)
Analyze dependencies (ensure proper agent loading order)
Version control agents (track changes, rollback if needed)
triggers: User says: 'Create an agent for X'
User says: 'Which agent should handle X?'
User says: 'Show all agents' or 'List agents'
User says: 'Agent status' or 'Agent health check'

outputs.format: json configs, markdown prompts, registry updates

test_prompts: Which agent should handle Frame Maps?
Create an agent for voice quality control
notes: This is the foundation agent that manages all other agents. Must remain stable and well-documented.
